Harboe sobre asistencia de Piñera a marchas: "Es bastante sorprendente su respuesta"
El senador del PPD también sostuvo que ante un acuerdo constitucional, "hemos recibido un portazo permanente por parte de la derecha".
05 Nov 2019 by Yem Manríquez

Con información de Manuel Palominos

El senador Felipe Harboe (PPD) se refirió a la entrevista del Presidente Sebastián Piñera, donde aseguró que él ha estado en las marchas y donde no descartó un acuerdo constitucional. 
"En general se observa un Presidente poco ajeno a lo que está ocurriendo en la realidad. Cuando él dice que ha participado en manifestaciones, es bastante sorprendente su respuesta", opinó el parlamentario.
"Mi percepción es que el Presidente está en una situación límite. Un 13% de aprobación contra un 87% de rechazo, y eso evidentemente estima una debilidad estructural", sostuvo.
Concluyendo que "y que el Presidente se abra a un acuerdo constitucional, tiene toda la lógica, lo venimos planteando hace tanto tiempo y hemos recibido un portazo permanente por parte de la derecha".
text:
Harboe on Piñera's assistance to marches: "Your answer is quite surprising"
The PPD senator also said that before a constitutional agreement, "we have received a permanent slam from the right."
05 Nov 2019 by Yem Manríquez

With information from Manuel Palominos

Senator Felipe Harboe (PPD) referred to the interview of President Sebastián Piñera, where he assured that he has been in the marches and where he did not rule out a constitutional agreement.
"In general, there is a President who is not oblivious to what is happening in reality. When he says he has participated in demonstrations, his response is quite surprising," said the parliamentarian.
"My perception is that the President is in a borderline situation. A 13% approval against an 87% rejection, and that evidently estimates a structural weakness," he said.
Concluding that "and that the President be open to a constitutional agreement, it has all the logic, we have been proposing it for so long and we have received a permanent slam from the right."
